00107 // ----------------------------------------------------------------------------
00108 //  CLASS : sc_fxnum_observer
00109 //
00110 //  Abstract base class for fixed-point types observers; arbitrary precision.
00111 // ----------------------------------------------------------------------------
00112 
00113 class SC_API sc_fxnum_observer
00114 {
00115 
00116 protected:
00117     
00118     sc_fxnum_observer() {}
00119     virtual ~sc_fxnum_observer() {}
00120 
00121 public:
00122 
00123     virtual void construct( const sc_fxnum& );
00124     virtual void  destruct( const sc_fxnum& );
00125     virtual void      read( const sc_fxnum& );
00126     virtual void     write( const sc_fxnum& );
00127 
00128     static sc_fxnum_observer* (*default_observer) ();
00129 
00130 };
00131
